review_title: Good Quality but Fits on the Small Side
reviews:
I normally buy Fruit of the Loom Sweat Shirts but thought I'd give this one a try when it was on sale.

The material is good quality and I like the tag-less design. I did find the Hanes Sweat Shirt is more form fitting or smaller than the Fruit of the Loom Sweat Shirt of the same size. Fruit of the Loom is looser fitting and has more arm room than the Hanes.

Overall I like this Sweatshirt however I prefer the slightly larger looser fitting Fruit of the Loom sweatshirt compared to the Hanes. I mostly use sweatshirts for layering at work, hence the looser fit.

I personally would not buy this sweatshirt again however it is good quality and if you like form fitting clothes or are on the skinnier or thinner side of the scale ... this Hanes Sweatshirt might be perfect for you.

review_title: Love these sweaters and great price

I would go up just one size for fit.

I definitely prefer this style to women's crew neck styles.

reviews:

It fits well as a medium but when I wash it I expect it will be too small to wear after. Nice colors, the fabric is starchy but soft inside. Order a size up if you like a more comfortable, looser fit.

I've noticed that in the left cuff of these sweaters (I ordered three in different colors, same size) there's some bunched up thread or something that irritates my left wrist. It just constantly rubs and rubs on the same small spot but I can't seem to locate exactly where on the cuff the irritant is. Somewhere along the seam. It's the same in all three sweaters, and you can't push or roll up the sleeves because the cuff is too tight.
